title: Froggy cakes
ingredients: ['225g (8 oz) butter', '225g (8 oz) self raising flour', '225g (8 oz) granulated sugar', '4 eggs', '2 granny smith apples', 'Small jar raspberry jam', '2 packets green ready to roll icing', '1 packet white ready to roll icing', '1 packet black ready to roll icing', '1 packet red ready to roll icing']
